channel.title: Azure on That's it ! Code Snippets
channel.description: Recent content in Azure on That's it ! Code Snippets

item.title: How to Create a Static Html Website With Basic Authentication on Azure in 10 Minutes
item.description:
In this article, we will talk about how to build a static website on Azure, when accessed user name and password is needed because basic authentication module is added.

  • Create a free Azure account
  • Create and deploy the sample static html website to Azure
  • Update Home Page (index.html)
  • Add authentication module and set username and password
  • Conclusion
  • References

item.title: How to Use Form Recognizer to Extract Items From Receipt
item.description:
In this article, Let’s use Azure Form Recognizer, latest AI-OCR tool developed by Microsoft to extract items from receipt.

  • Setup Azure (Microsoft Cloud Computing Services) account
  • Setup Form Recognizer Studio setting
  • Use prebuild model to extract items from receipt downloaded from Intenet
